entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023
